name: Art Academy: Home Studio
overview: Create your own works of art with advanced drawing tools! Make your home an art studio as you learn to paint and draw! Follow along with 30 new art lessons, and create your own masterpieces using the Wii U™ GamePad controller. Share works of art via Miiverse™, and upload time-lapse videos of your creations to YouTube! Build your portfolio, and share your creations with the Art Academy™ community! The Art Academy™: Home Studio software introduces new and more robust lessons that make it easy for anyone to learn the basics of drawing or go in depth with more advanced techniques. The stylus and touch-screen controls of the Wii U™ GamePad controller offer a lifelike feel, whether you're layering paint on stroke by stroke, blending pastels, or using the new charcoal medium. Let others see your creative process in motion by uploading time-lapse videos! Regardless of age or experience level, everyone can learn to create works of art and share them with others.
